title: 03/26/21 DPS Best OF
itunes:title: 03/26/21 DPS Best OF
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses the trade deadline. Adam Lefkoe of TNT and Bleacher Report joined the show in the first hour to explain which teams are in a better situation based on the moves they made. After departing ESPN in January, Dan Le Batard surprises Dan with a visit via zoom to catch up on how life's been post-mothership. Lastly, ahead of the Sweet 16 this weekend, Clark Kellogg caught up with Dan to break down what went well with the Pac-12 and what went wrong for the Big Ten

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
